name: markdown-it-tex-graph
description: Generate graphs based on katex formulas in Markdown documents using markdown-it.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && c8 --exclude dist --exclude test --check-coverage --branches 100 --functions 100 --lines 100 -r text -r html -r lcov mocha "test/**/*.js"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build

author: Roberto Donaglia
